data.name: Stream cipher
data.description:
Create a function `stream_cipher(msg, pwd)` to encrypt/decrypt a message with a given password.

Allowed characters are: +/0-9a-zA-Z (0-63, similar to base64)

`+/0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ`

Key generation
----------------

If message length is greater than password length, a new one has to be generated from the previous one.

    old: "hello"
    a:   "hello"
    b:   "hloel" (odd + even indices)
    c:   "olleh" (reversed)
    d:   "olhle" (reversed -> odd + even indices)
    pos:  12345

    new[i] = ((a[i]+b[i]) * pos) XOR ((c[i]+d[i]) * pos) mod 64
    new: 'ggH+o'

Stream Cipher
---------------

Password and message characters are combined using the logical operator `XOR`.

    cipher[i] = msg[i] XOR pwd[i]
    msg[i] = cipher[i] XOR pwd[i]
    
Return the encrypted/decrypted message as a string.
